name: Update Trello cards with person information and company information using Clearbit
description: Every time a new card is created in Trello, Make will validate the email address in the card's name using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will look that person up using Clearbit with that email. If there is a result it will update that card with the person's data. It will also look that person's company up using Clearbit. If there is a result it will check another list for cards that have the same company name. If there are non it will create a card with that company data.
